components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
h2. Problem

After adding the ti.udp module in a project, Android app build (emulator/device) fails.

h2. Test case

Create new Android project.
Declare ti.udp module on the tiapp.xml:
{code:lang=xml|title=tiapp.xml}
...
<modules>
    <module platform="android">ti.udp</module>
</modules>
...
{code}
Run.

h2. Logs

Attached.

h2. Discussions
[Q&A|http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/160903/tiudp---cannot-read-property-proxyattrs-of-undefined--abnormal-process-termination]
fields.summary: ti.udp - Building error after adding module

comments.body: [~rafaelgdiniz] This could be related to TIMOB-16092 ticket that was fixed recently. Even though the ticket subject mentions sqlcipher module, this ticket applies to other Android modules as well.
[~rafaelgdiniz] TIMOB-16092 has been resolved and the fix is available in 3.2.1 CI builds. I would appreciate if you can verify your application with the latest 3.2.1 CI build.
